titulo: Digital twins and/or their major components for environment, climate and security
descricao: Expected Outcome:Improved security and preparedness for the Union and more disaster resilient society facing the adverse effects of climate change;Improved capacity of key users and decision-makers to anticipate, mitigate and contain risks at the vulnerable societal sectors at the intersection of climate change, environment and security;Further development of the data lab infrastructure around Destination Earth in line with the AI continent Action Plan[1] Scope:Climate change has both direct and
